name: Night Circuit
description:
You are trying to escape a facility that is under power failure. The only means of escape is to go through the emergency exit door, which needs power sources scattered across the map. However, taking those power sources affect the lighting of the area and leaves you in complete darkness. You'll need to find your way back through the dark, using the glowy indicators you placed beforehand as reference.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • E to interact with batteries
  • Left click to leave, right click to take back indicators
  • F to take all indicators back
  • R to go back to latest checkpoint

This was an entry for Pumpkin Jam with the theme "Leave it Behind".

Ege Özteke - 3D Artist, Game Designer
Gökcan Kırca - Programmer, Game Designer
Kardelen Erdinç - Music
Zelal Deniz Yıldız - SFX Artist
